item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software developer in my final year of study: Technological University of the Shannon: Midlands Midwest BSc (Hons) degree in Software Design (Cloud Computing) I enjoy software development of any kind, but I do prefer programming with strongly typed languages. I aim to be a jack of all trades when it comes to software and with majority of my projects I try to expand into as many fields as I can.
